channel.title: The Good News Shut Up Podcast
channel.description: Gamers chillin and talking about games. The GNSU Crew (Arien, James, and Brian) talk about what is new in the industry, what they have been playing, and a variety of topics each Wednesday. Humorous, irreverent and a little absurd, this is the Good News Shut Up Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Gamers chillin and talking about games. The GNSU Crew (Arien, James, and Brian) talk about what is new in the industry, what they have been playing, and a variety of topics each Wednesday. Humorous, irreverent and a little absurd, this is the Good News
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Good News Shut Up Podcast!

image.title: The Good News Shut Up Podcast

channel.itunes:author: Arien and James

item.title: Episode 1: The beginning
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: The GNSU Crew Discusses what they are playing, games they enjoy for the wrong reasons, and horrible video game movies!
item.itunes:subtitle: The GNSU Crew Discusses what they are playing, games they enjoy for the wrong reasons, and horrible video game movies!
item.itunes:summary: The GNSU Crew Discusses what they are playing, games they enjoy for the wrong reasons, and horrible video game movies!
item.itunes:keywords: video games, gaming, podcast, gnsu, good news shut up, arien, russell, james, henry, mega man, kane and lynch, megaman

item.title: Episode 2: Lets Get Physicscals
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: The GNSU Crew discusses Red Dead Redemption, realism in video games, and a questionable video Arien found...

item.title: Episode 3: That Podcast is BANANAS!
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: The GNSU Crew welcomes special guest Carlos Lopez of AngryBananas.com to discuss the street fighter scene, arcades, and gaming music!
item.itunes:subtitle: The GNSU Crew welcomes special guest Carlos Lopez of AngryBananas.com to discuss the street fighter scene, arcades, and gaming music!
item.itunes:summary: The GNSU Crew welcomes special guest Carlos Lopez of AngryBananas.com to discuss the street fighter scene, arcades, and gaming music!
item.itunes:keywords: good news shut up gnsu carlos lopez angrybananas.com super turbo podcast street fighter arcade games gaming video game ps3 360 pc

item.title: Episode 4: Contests! Under-appreciated Games! E3!
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: Arien and James discuss their first real contest as well as their favorite underappreciated games along with the exquisite Brian Frobel and the lovely Angel Rivera. http://www.goodnewsshutup.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Arien and James discuss their first real contest as well as their favorite underappreciated games along with the exquisite Brian Frobel and the lovely Angel Rivera. http://www.goodnewsshutup.com

item.itunes:keywords: contest, toy soldiers, e3, mischief makers, kick master, tales of symphonia, wild arms, indie

item.title: Episode 5: E3! It is over! The best and the worst!
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: E3 is over and the GNSU Crew discuss the good, the bad, the ugly and Shaun Whites hair...
item.itunes:subtitle: E3 is over and the GNSU Crew discuss the good, the bad, the ugly and Shaun Whites hair...

item.title: Episode 6: Dont Stop Achieving
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: Achievements - a love and hate story. Do they enhance or detract from games? Brian goes missing and gets temporarily replaced by Mike. Hilarity ensues.
item.itunes:subtitle: Achievements - a love and hate story. Do they enhance or detract from games? Brian goes missing and gets temporarily replaced by Mike. Hilarity ensues.
item.itunes:summary: Achievements - a love and hate story. Do they enhance or detract from games? Brian goes missing and gets temporarily replaced by Mike. Hilarity ensues.

item.title: Episode 7: The Co-op Experience
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: Co-op games are like a virtual high five. Whats better than helping your buddy out or screwing them over for a laugh? GNSU discusses co-op gaming, whats new in gaming, and what theyre playing
item.itunes:subtitle: Co-op games are like a virtual high five. Whats better than helping your buddy out or screwing them over for a laugh? GNSU discusses co-op gaming, whats new in gaming, and what theyre playing
item.itunes:summary: Co-op games are like a virtual high five. Whats better than helping your buddy out or screwing them over for a laugh? GNSU discusses co-op gaming, whats new in gaming, and what theyre playing

item.title: Episode 8: It is hot as BALLS (of burning gas)
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: Arien, James, and Brian attempt to chill even when it is hot as balls outside but things take a turn for the not quite chill - will they go insane or keep cool?
item.itunes:subtitle: Arien, James, and Brian attempt to chill even when it is hot as balls outside but things take a turn for the not quite chill - will they go insane or keep cool?
item.itunes:summary: Arien, James, and Brian attempt to chill even when it is hot as balls outside but things take a turn for the not quite chill - will they go insane or keep cool?

item.title: Episode 9: Games Gone Wrong
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description:
Sometimes good games go bad. No, not in a Will Smith \"bad means good\" kind of way. We mean they suck. In this week\'s podcast the GNSU Crew has a round table discussion about some pretty awful entries in popular franchises. Three words: Mario\'s Time Machine. Need we say more?
We also give our thoughts on the new TF2 update and Crackdown 2\'s multiplayer components.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sometimes good games go bad. No, not in a Will Smith \"bad means good\" kind of way. We mean they suck. In this week\'s podcast the GNSU Crew has a round table discussion about some pretty awful entries in popular franchises. Three words: Mario\'s Tim
item.itunes:summary: Sometimes good games go bad. No, not in a Will Smith \"bad means good\" kind of way. We mean they suck. In this week\'s podcast the GNSU Crew has a round table discussion about some pretty awful entries in popular franchises. Three words: Mario\'s Tim
item.itunes:keywords: mario, sonic, nintendo, sega, microsoft, rare, sony, ps3, wii, xbox, crackdown 2, tf2, valve

item.title: Episode 10: The Death of Arcade Games
item.itunes:author: Arien and James
item.dc:creator: Arien and James
item.description: Arcades are dead. The GNSU Crew mourns the loss of real arcades by recalling fond memories. They also discuss Alien Swarm, DJ Hero and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Arcades are dead. The GNSU Crew mourns the loss of real arcades by recalling fond memories. They also discuss Alien Swarm, DJ Hero and more!
item.itunes:summary: Arcades are dead. The GNSU Crew mourns the loss of real arcades by recalling fond memories. They also discuss Alien Swarm, DJ Hero and more!
